tool_description: QuikRun: Your Code's wingman in the Cloud! Compile, Share, and Test code with ease. Say Goodbye to Hassles, Hello to QuikRun's streamlined coding power!
name: QuikRun
title: QuikRun

api_list.name: Create Submission
api_list.description: Paste your code snippet inside body to compile code via API.

api_list.name: Exchange Token
api_list.description: Get access token from refresh token
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quikrun.p.rapidapi.com/user/exchange-token"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quikrun.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create Submission by Snippet Id
api_list.description: Paste your QuikRun snippet id and the rest will be handled by API.

api_list.name: Login User
api_list.description: Login user via email and password
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quikrun.p.rapidapi.com/user/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quikrun.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
